citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00pm on 28-FEB-
2024. The inspector spoke to a family member who stated the licensee was not home. The inspector called the work
phone number and left a message.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat

phone number and left a message.
